title: Commercial enterprises
context: [ยง304A-113] Commercial enterprises. Any law to the contrary notwithstanding, the university may engage in commercial enterprises that are related and incidental to the primary purposes of the university as set forth in this chapter, including but not limited to sponsorship of private, cultural, and athletic performances and sale of goods produced by university programs or goods bearing the university logo. [L 2006, c 75, pt of ยง2]
